title: Kelly Ripa's throwback pic of her son will have you laughing so hard
text:
Mothers across the country are getting into that back-to-school swing and Kelly Ripa is no different.

The talk show host wrote Thursday, "#tbt 2006 Back to school edition. Joaquin’s very first day of school ever. Can’t say he looked thrilled about it."

In the pic, her son does not look happy one bit about heading off to class.

Ripa's husband, Mark Consuelos, responded to the post with a heart emoji.

Consuelos' "Riverdale" co-star Marisol Nichols added about her son, "Rain has that same look."

While the 16-year-old heads back to high school, Ripa's daughter is off to college.

Earlier this week, she shared a pic with her daughter Lola, 18, and wrote, "The nest is getting roomy."

That came after the throwback of her daughter she shared last week.

"#tbt 2001 from your Christening to college. In the blink of an eye. I’m not crying. You’re crying (actually Daddy’s sobbing) ," she wrote.
description: Mothers across the country are getting into that back to school swing and Kelly Ripa is no different.
